ComicInfo.Summary:
Shortly after a mysterious stranger arrives in Barrow, Alaska, the power goes out and the town falls into darkness. But having no electricity is the least of Barrowâ€™s worries, because new strangers are approaching... and they are very hungry. The reimagining of 30 Days of Night continues in an all-new and all-horrifying direction!
